DESCRIPTION: When Exhausted always #yPurge. If this card is Exhausted or Purged, activate the following effect.
Draw X cards. If you draw a Kosmo card, gain 1 Energy, this only happens the first time per card. Non-Kosmo cards are Exhausted upon draw.
Look at the top X cards of your draw pile. You may choose X amount, Exhaust the rest.
Always start in the Exhaust pile. If it's Purged increased the damage by 50% and return into your hand.
#yPurge this card if it is in your hand at the end of turn. Cards Purged this way do not trigger any effects that activate upon being Purged.
Played cards this way keep the orginal features, so don't play cards that can't be normally played.
Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
When played shuffle this card into your draw pile.
